content:
The Alfa Romeo Giulia GTA is an all-time classic. Based on the Giulia Berlina of the mid-’60s, this sporty two-door model racked up countless wins for Alfa Romeo on the tracks where the GTA built its giant-killer reputation.

Now, some 55 years later, Totem Automobili is finally ready to reveal to us the Electric GT, a hand-built, modern take on the GTA that packs 518 electric horsepower and 518 and 692 pound-feet of torque. Detractors, however, argue this is nothing more but an exercise in automotive sacrilege.


	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	





	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	





	

	
		
			
				
					
						
					
				
			
			
				
					
						The Totem Electric GT Is A Guilt-Free Alternative To the Alfa Romeo GTA
					
				

				The tiny Giulia GTA represents one of Alfa Romeo's defining moments and Totem has recreated it in painstaking detail, minus the smoke out of the exhaust

				
					
						
							
						
					
					www.topspeed.com
author: Matey

content: nisem vedel, da sem v porn forumu
author: hermann

content: Hja, na vsake toliko se pa tudi med električarji najde avto za katerega bi že morda lahko rekel, da "ima dušo"
author: Matey

content: meni je edino škoda, da se gre predelovat originale
author: hermann

content:
Ampak s tem se pa  ni varno peljat.
Niti enega AB nima
author: Hanzi

content: Kaj ti bodo AB? Sej v navadnih Alfah tud ne delajo
author: AndrejEnej

content: Ful lepo.  Ko naredijo teh 20 kosov alf, lahko samo s spremembo scudetta izdelajo še lancio fulvio hf coupe - bolj vleče na lancio kot alfo
author: TGV

content: A to lahko že takoj registriras  kot oldtimer, al pa vsaj youngtimer.
author: Hanzi

content: Kaj ni pogoj za registracijo oldtimerja/youngtimerja, da je avto bolj kot ne originalen oz. nepredelan?
author: Matey

content: Hanzi - če je resno vprašanje, potem je odgovor "ne".  Kot sem videl v opisu  je potrebno najprej imeti originalno alfo potem sledi predelava.
author: TGV

Now, some 55 years later, Totem Automobili is finally ready to reveal to us the Electric GT, a hand-built, modern take on the GTA that packs 518 electric horsepower and 518 and 692 pound-feet of torque. Detractors, however, argue this is nothing more but an exercise in automotive sacrilege.
